fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Culture, Energy, Business and Industry, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Public Health, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
Helping citizens in filling in and submitting applications to grants and / or investment / co-financing programs. 
Organize meetings and conferences in order to bring the European Union and its representatives in Italy closer to the regional and provincial reality. 
Spread and publicize the successes achieved by entrepreneurs and citizens through collaboration with the European Union.
membership: European Register of Euro-projects Designers and Managers
goals__remit:
Organize information meetings between public and / or private citizens / companies and the institutions of the European community. 
Promote the activities and initiatives of the European Union in all business, association and ONLUS NGOs.
relevant_communication:
We organize and publish a collection of useful and necessary information to cooperate with the European Union in the presentation of co-investment programs in the Agricultural, Commercial and Social field. 
We will be organizing a regional biennial Biennial Convention to present the proposed work and the successes achieved through the collaboration between Institutions and Citizens.
customers: Studio SIC SRL# FM Trade SRL
